author: lgo
msg: Prepare the python tests to be run in parallel:
Stop using global variables svntest.main.current_repo_url and
svntest.main.current_repo_dir. Since all tests have a sandbox,
replace the current_repo_url and current_repo_dir vars with
Replace all uses of svntest.main.current_repo_url with sbox.repo_url

author: xsteve
msg: (svn-status-dired-jump): XEmacs uses dired-jump-back instead of dired-jump

author: jerenkrantz
msg: ra_serf: Expose our XML-based error message handling and use it within locks RA
This lets the message as to who holds the lock be seen by the client.
Passes lock_tests #6 (lock a file and verify lock stealing behavior) and #29
((un)lock set of files, one already (un)locked) by returning the magic error
strings our test suite is looking for.
(svn_ra_serf__lock): Look in the new error field.
